summary: Vermont is a small state in the northeast USA, bordered by Massachusetts, New Hampshire, New York, and Quebec. With a population of around 643,500, it is one of the least populated states. The state capital, Montpelier, is the least-populated capital. Native Americans lived there for thousands of years before French and British colonists arrived. It became an independent republic in 1777 during the American Revolution and joined the USA in 1791. Vermont is known for its mountains, forests, and maple syrup production. It has a strong reputation for progressive policies.
title: Vermont
